Items.item_name: Vatika Moisture Treatment Shampoo 200 ml
Items.item_description: Short Description: • Removes dirt and oil from the surface of the hair fibers and the scalp • Shampoo to nourish hair from root to tip and replenish moisture • Formulated with Vatika oils and herbal formula • Enriched with selected natural extracts • Infused with almond, yoghurt and honey • Ideal for dry and frizzy hair • PVC free and halal • No added paraffin, alcohol & phthalate Long Description: Dabur Vatika Naturals Almond & Honey Moisture Treatment Shampoo is a hair care product that is formulated to address the needs of individuals with dry and frizzy hair. It contains a combination of natural ingredients, including almond, honey, yogurt, and henna, to provide several benefits for your hair. The shampoo is designed to maintain soft and hydrated hair throughout the day. It helps to replenish essential moisture in dry hair, making it more manageable and preventing it from feeling dry and lifeless. Almond is known to strengthen hair strands and encourage hair growth. It can contribute to making your hair stronger and more resilient. The natural properties of the ingredients in the shampoo, including almond and honey, can make your hair appear glossier and healthier. Yogurt, one of the key ingredients, contains active bacterial enzymes that can help treat dandruff and itchy scalp while also cleansing your scalp effectively. It also moisturizes your hair and locks in natural oils, giving it a natural shine. The shampoo is enriched with Vatika oils and other natural extracts, providing intensive nourishment from the roots to the tips of your hair. Honey in the formula has hydrating properties that help maintain moisture in your hair, keeping it soft and silky. Honey also possesses antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties, which can be beneficial for the health of your scalp. Dabur Vatika Naturals Almond & Honey Moisture Treatment Shampoo is specially formulated for people with dry, frizzy, and coarse hair, making it ideal for those who struggle with these hair issues. In summary, the Dabur Vatika Naturals Almond & Honey Moisture Treatment Shampoo is designed to provide deep nourishment and hydration to dry and frizzy hair while addressing issues like dandruff and itchy scalp. It uses natural ingredients to improve the overall health and appearance of your hair, leaving it soft, shiny, and manageable. Benefits: • Prevents hair from becoming dry and frizzy by nourishing and smoothing the hair shaft • Provides nutrients to hair so it can maintain its shine for a long time • Helps replenish essential moisture making hair manageable • Helps remove dirt, debris, and odors, such as smoke or sweat effectively • Makes your hair smooth and silky without weighing it down • Gives you that healthy, bouncy and shiny hair • Makes your hair feel smoother to the touch • Hydrates and strengthens the hair, boost shine, soothe the scalp • Coats and seals essential moisture into each hair strand How To Use: • Wet your hair thoroughly before applying shampoo. Use warm water to open the hair cuticle for more thorough cleansing. Squirt a small amount of Dabur Vatika Naturals Almond & Honey Moisture Treatment Shampoo into the palm of your hand. Mix the shampoo with a little water in your hand before applying so it moves through your hair more evenly. Apply it to your scalp and massage until it lathers. Work the shampoo through your hair but pay the most attention to the scalp. Rinse your hair and scalp thoroughly. Don’t scrub at your scalp with your nails while shampooing or be rough. Hair is more fragile when wet and tangles more easily. Don’t shampoo twice. Only extremely dirty hair would ever need it.

Items.item_name: Dabur Vatika Shampoo Repair & Rest 400 ml
Items.item_description: Short Description: • Shampoo to repair and revitalize hair • To coat and seal essential moisture into hair • Infused with natural extracts • Enriched with honey and egg • Halal & PVC free • For strong revitalized hair • Ideal for damaged, split hair Long Description: Dabur Vatika Naturals Repair & Restore Shampoo With Honey & Egg For Damaged, Split Hair is enriched with selected natural extracts of egg and honey for strong, re-vitalized hair. Egg yolks contains lecithin, which is an emulsifier. It combines with water, dirt and oils from your hair, then everything rinses out. Amongst its many other health benefits, lecithin is also a good moisturizer. Applying egg yolk topically to your scalp can infuse the root of your hair with vitamins. This means that the new hair will grow out stronger and be less prone to breakage and shedding. When your hair doesn't fall out as much, it becomes fuller. It can even seem like it's growing in faster. Honey has emollient and humectant properties that add moisture to the hair follicles. This naturally smooths the hair shaft and restores shine and luster to frizzy, dry, curly, or dull hair. Its natural humectant properties seal in moisture to prevent future moisture loss, too. The main purpose of Dabur Vatika Naturals Repair & Restore Shampoo With Honey & Egg For Damaged, Split Hair is to remove dirt and oil from the surface of the hair fibres and the scalp. Dabur India Limited is the fourth largest FMCG Company in India. Building on a legacy of quality and experience of over 137 years, Dabur is today India’s most trusted name and the world’s largest ayurvedic and natural health care company with a portfolio of over 250 Herbal/Ayurvedic products. Vatika is the proud members of the Dabur Group, a world-leading ayurvedic and natural products company. Vatika has always prided themselves on manifesting nature's amazing powers in nourishing, rejuvenating and adding vitality to hair. At Vatika, the philosophy is that beauty comes from the heart. Benefits: • Helps make hair stronger and healthy from root to tip • Honey aids in protecting and locking in moisture-rich hair • Regulates metabolism and balances scalp condition, making hair silky and smooth • Gently cleanses your hair • Gives softer and shinier hair • Makes hair easier to handle How To Use: • Brush your hair before bath. It helps to untangle hair for easy removal of oil, sweat, dirt or styling products. • Wet your hair thoroughly with water. Shampoos are only effective when it lathers fully. A thorough rinse with water will help the lathering process. • Spread an adequate amount of Dabur Vatika Naturals Repair & Restore Shampoo With Honey & Egg For Damaged, Split Hair on your palms, then spread it evenly through your hair and let it soak. • Work your way to the scalp. Once there is enough lather, massage your scalp with the tip of your fingers. (If washing once is insufficient, wash again.) • Rinse thoroughly. Squeeze and remove excessive lather, before rinsing every strand of hair thoroughly.

Product Benefits: HYDRATING + ENERGIZING + BRIGHTENING The equivalent of 1 week of hydrating serum* For dull skin Vitamin C Shot Dermatologically tested How to Use: 1.
